
# Workflow of PIHM System

![The workflow of modeling with PIHM System](./Fig/Workflow.png)

1. Prepare raw Essential Terrestrial Variables (ETV)
2. Convert and crop raw data with research area boundary.
3. Build the PIHM modeling domain with PIHMgis or PIHMgisR (recommended for
 PIHM++)
3. Run PIHM on desktop or cluster.
4. Analysis the PIHM results with PIHMgisR.
